item.title: SKII Recommender System Design
item.author: xinyuyangren@foxmail.com (Rick)
item.description: Abstract This prototype finished during P&G Data Science Hackthon, Nov. 2016 in Cincinati, OH. This document briefly elaborates the design ideology for SKII onsite recommender system, leverage the demographics data, skin scan result and purchase history. Note. all the confidential data has been pre-processed. The Dataset The data used in this recommender system consists of the folling 3 parts: Demographics information (1 million rows * 10 columns), including gender, age, marital status etc.
